 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְזַק‎</span>] **verb** ==suffer injury== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nazâ‡u***</u></abbr>, ***injure***; on combination with Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***impair***, see [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 51</sup> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>BAS iii. 81</sup>); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נָזִ֑ק‎</span> [[Dan.6.3|Dan 6:3]]. **Haph\`el** ***injure: Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּהַנְזִ֑ק‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 33, 2</sup>) [[Ezra.4.13|Ezra 4:13]] (accusative of person). ***Participle active*** f. construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְהַנְזְקַת מַלְכְין‎</span> v[[Ezra.4.15|Ezra 4:15]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְהַנְזָתַ מ‎</span> v[[Ezra.4.22|Ezra 4:22]] ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>ib.</sup> ***d)***; [[BDB#Marti|M]]<sup>§ 48</sup> ***c*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קֻת‎</span>-).
